entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Haines Junction
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
